original_text: They shall take up serpents; and if they drink any deadly thing, it shall not hurt them; they shall lay hands on the sick, and they shall recover.
korean_text: 뱀을 집어올리며 무슨 독을 마실지라도 해를 받지 아니하며 병든 사람에게 손을 얹은즉 나으리라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: and if they drink any deadly thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 어떤 치명적인 것을 마시면

sentences.original_text: they shall lay hands on the sick
